name: RegexValidator_isValidTest
description: Unit tests for the isValid method of the RegexValidator class.

test_cases.name: testIsValidWithNullValue
test_cases.description: Tests the isValid method with a null value, expecting false.

test_cases.name: testIsValidWithMatchingValue
test_cases.description: Tests the isValid method with a matching value, expecting true.

test_cases.name: testIsValidWithNonMatchingValue
test_cases.description: Tests the isValid method with a non-matching value, expecting false.

test_cases.name: testIsValidWithSingleRegexMatching
test_cases.description: Tests the isValid method with a single regex matching, expecting true.

test_cases.name: testIsValidWithSingleRegexNonMatching
test_cases.description: Tests the isValid method with a single regex non-matching, expecting false.

test_cases.name: testIsValidWithMultipleRegexMatching
test_cases.description: Tests the isValid method with multiple regex matching, expecting true.

test_cases.name: testIsValidWithMultipleRegexNonMatching
test_cases.description: Tests the isValid method with multiple regex non-matching, expecting false.
